website_summaries.verdict: Pro-grade, "prosumer" video and stills for a price well below the pro level.
pros: Feature-rich: image stabilization, manual mode, 5.1-channel surround sound
Easy for amateurs and professionals alike
cons: Will not record 5.1 surround sound when you record in 4K

website_summaries.verdict: Excellent auto or manual adjustment options for both amateur and advanced users.
pros: You can take a photo while recording or later while editing
Compact and lightweight for excellent portability
View screen rotates 180º for taking selfies
cons: Small view screen that is prone to glare

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Camera for my Family and our Travels
customer_reviews.text: So, I spent likely 800 hours researching cameras before making this purchase. I looked into everything from point and shoot, to DSLRs to camcorders. At the end of the day, I realized I'm not the type of person who will sit and attempt to frame a perfect image with a still camera. I enjoy taking family videos and documenting our travels and so image stabilization has always been very important. This camera blew my expectations out of the water. Image quality at the stabilization was perfect for me. The main con is the battery, however a $20 purchase of extra batteries can resolve that. Phenominal camera. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Payton Gannaway

customer_reviews.title: Disregard negative Reviews.  Buy this Camera
customer_reviews.text: First let me start off by saying this is the perfect bridge between a professional camera and a home video camera. I read a review about the battery life not being great. Absolutely false. I have the standard battery with 4K settings at 100 frame rate and it lasts well over four hours. Don’t buy the extra oversized battery it defeats the use of the eye piece. Just buy the one and half inch thick battery. I have owned this for over a year and have no complaints. I shoot great basketball videos and low light dance of my kids. A must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Eric J. Strawn

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: this was an upgrade from my sony a5000 series and oh BOY, this is such a well deserved upgrade. I was on the fence between this and the AX33, and I got the 53 because of the improved lowlight that it has over the 33. 4k video at 30 FPS 100mb bit rate records beautifully! even near dusk time with minimal noise just as long as you keep the gain locked at 24. over all, this is a very impressive camera and records beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Marks Tech

customer_reviews.title: Best 4k on the market
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera for about 6 months, and am extremely pleased with it. This is my first real movie camera. I've taken video with my DSLR, but it's not the same. Still getting used to some of the settings and features. The image stabilization is excellent. The 20x1 zoom is great. The image quality is beyond what I expected. The only negatives are minor. One is the flip out view screen is hard to see in the sun, and the second is the eyepiece could use an eye cup.
customer_reviews.author: Greg57

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, bad user interface
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camcorder with tons of features. I'm dropping two stars because the user interface is horrible, clumsy, and non-intuitive. In order to change resolution, for example, you have to first pick a codec. And it's difficult to find manual settings, which can sometimes be set to manual and you don't even realize it until after messing up your shots. Basically, you need to spend some time setting up the camera before each recording, and train yourself to become an expert with it before anything critical comes along.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Staton

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few months.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a few months ago and seemed to work great. Then, in the middle of a vacation it stopped working and the touch screen became unresponsive.
customer_reviews.author: Backrack

customer_reviews.title: It's too dark.
customer_reviews.text: I planned on doing glamour videos of goth attire, dresses, etc. All the objects appeared to have crushed shadows unless I spot-lit each object. How annoying. Even the "high key" color preset just made the images bland, even after color grading it looked cheap. I ended up returning. I currently use a Sony A6500 mirrorless camera with Neewer 35mm f1.7 lens, and that blows the AX53 out of this world. I can see all the detail in the dark clothing. I should have kept the media test shots, but I didn't.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is a second camera for my YouTube channel. Once again, Sony Handycam does not disappoint. I'm not a professional AV person by any means, but this camera is wonderful. You can keep it plugged in and shoot a video at the same time so no end to battery life - or conversely, the battery lasts about 3 hours. The lens cover automatically opens and closes as you open/close the side viewer. If it times out and turns off, there's an on/off button to turn it on without having to close the viewfinder screen. I use this mostly for still shots vs. action like sports. It's light weight and so intuitively easy to use. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BeckyLeeSews

customer_reviews.title: Arrived faster than expected and the image quality is great! The controls are a bit confusing with non-industry ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived faster than expected and the image quality is great! The controls are a bit confusing with non-industry standard pictographs and icons. And I can't believe there is no way to easily over-ride the auto exposure for backlit or spotlit subjects. After randomly pressing a bunch of the digital buttons, a backlight setting appeared for 2 seconds and I could never find it again. Not a smart design.
customer_reviews.author: Wildside Nature Tours

customer_reviews.title: At last a true professional like 4K camera from Sony for Home use
customer_reviews.text: Three cheers to Sony. Finally I have a 4K camcorder that is good at all levels. Good picture stability, clarity and true 4K ultra high definition videos. Sony home memories software allows one to edit and burn Blu ray discs of home movies in 4k which makes it look like a professional videography even by amateurs. This camera even has a setting where you can make two videos at the same time-one in ultra 4K and the other in digital HD AVHD. I only wish the camera came with a remote..
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Mathew

customer_reviews.title: Special Sony Software Required and other failures
customer_reviews.text: Proprietary Sony PlayMeories software makes this camera fail. You have to use this software to proceed with other video editing software. After converting, other editing software affects the quality of the video to be not saving. Also, to use any one of the functions such as manual focus, exposure control or other desired adjustments completely stops all remaining automatic functions. Also, maybe I haven't figured this out yet, but in automatic mode, exposure is too dark. As mentioned before, if I select manually changing exposure to correct for this, then all remaining automatic functions require to be done manually. Also, many desired functions are not available when operating in 4K!
customer_reviews.author: Bulaien

customer_reviews.title: 4k is over rated! hear me out
customer_reviews.text: This camcorder is great! It would be great for vlogging. It's light, has built in stabilization, and the zoom is amazing. This is the best all around video cam especially for the price. I Highly recommend shooting in XAVC S 1080p at 60fps though. The 4k quality isn't all that, the 1080p at 60fps is so smooth and the quality actually seems to be better in post as well. The autofocus is pretty decent. But for all around you can't beat it. Get you a few attachments and boom.
customer_reviews.author: Ibz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camcorder. There has been improvements on the camera ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camcorder. There has been improvements on the camera compared to ax 33. The low light seems to look better. Not as grainy.
customer_reviews.author: Jason R.

customer_reviews.title: The focus leaves a lot to be desired.
customer_reviews.text: I got this Sony to shoot trains and airplanes. I tried it on easy things first like a deer standing in the park. If the deer moved the focus would go out and not come back. If you zoomed in and out many times the focus would come back until the deer moved again. Do not even try to focus on something while panning. It just does not work. SONY FAIL!!
customer_reviews.author: Greg's Mopinions

customer_reviews.title: Poor video quality and defective viewfinder
customer_reviews.text: I had a lot of expectations for AX53. The image stabilization and zoom function as expected. However, the video quality leaves a lot to be desired. I own a mirrorless Nikon Z6 camera. The video taken in Z6 is sharper compared to AX53. The video looked so ordinary that I decided to return the camcorder. I feel the camcorder is little too expensive for the video quality it produces. In addition, I found the viewfinder to be of very little use and of poor quality. Not sure if it was defective in my case, I could observe the interiors of the video camera through the view finder.
customer_reviews.author: Arun

customer_reviews.title: SITTING IN THE BOX
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a special occasion. It is easy to use and good quality but I cannot figure out how to copy what I recorded to cd/dvd. Therefore the 'special occasion' is still on the camera and I have not used since then. I thought I could just transfer easily from the camera to cd/dvd. You have to use their software. I could not make the transfer. So there it sits, over a thousand dollars spent/wasted.
customer_reviews.author: bruce w.

customer_reviews.title: most incredible image stabilization. very usable camera for movies and photos
customer_reviews.text: at full zoom and with rather dim lighting, the camera took photos with virtually no shake. amazing! videos are rock steady with no shake whatsoever. lightweight as compared to an SLR. the photos are not as clean as that of an SLR in low light. overall, a camera that is totally worth its money.
customer_reviews.author: Venu

customer_reviews.title: Kind of disappointed. The focus seems slow and so it lacks ...
customer_reviews.text: Kind of disappointed. The focus seems slow and so it lacks sharpness often. I think my 1080P Canon might be better at times on a 4K TV even though it is upscaled. I would not buy it again as I think you need to wait another generation.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bedford

customer_reviews.title: An Amazing Camcorder
customer_reviews.text: I had previously rented one of these camcorders to record a choral concert. The image stabilization is so great that I decided I needed to buy one. The 4K image is sharp and clear and large enough to allow zooming in post processing if you will be producing the video in HD. Low light quality could be better, but it serves my purposes. The only problem I've had with it, was over-tightening the tripod plate and cracking the plastic around the mount. I sent it in and got it fixed and it's like a new camera. I love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Rice

customer_reviews.title: The internal Gyro is amazing very very steady video footage
customer_reviews.text: I wish I brought this back in 2016 when it was first released, The internal Gyro is amazing very very steady video footage. UPDATE the front lens cover broke and I had to return the camera
customer_reviews.author: Clint B

customer_reviews.title: Needed a night shot camera
customer_reviews.text: I needed a nightshot camera and this fit the bill. No regrets!
customer_reviews.author: Amadaeus

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded from ax33
customer_reviews.text: Noticeable difference between the ax53 and ax33. Picture quality just seems more clear and stabilization seems better as well. Very happy I upgraded
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camcorder!
customer_reviews.text: Love this camcorder! Even though my hand shakes when taping my sons football game when you play back it is picture perfect. I also love how you can transfer video from the camcorder right to my iPad by WiFi! Easy to use and amazing quality!
customer_reviews.author: Kenziee

customer_reviews.title: 4k Great Price
customer_reviews.text: 4k Image quality very good. Has wide angle zoom needed for indoor use. Compact. Purchased as a renewed item but was NEW just no box. Everything packed well. no missing items.
customer_reviews.author: rmw

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm a sony fan and this one is great. 4K quality looks amazing. This camera does not work well at night - I don't fault Sony for this. The image sensor is made for daylight. Set your expectations for lighted environments and you'll be very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: MeteorPETE Enterprises

customer_reviews.title: Not sure - Paid for New Got Used
customer_reviews.text: cant really give a full review since I received a used camcorder something is wrong with it, not that great of quality, probably why someone returned it already. Sending back as I paid for new.
customer_reviews.author: VA

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have only had it a short time and only touched the surface of what this can do, but so far it is great. Super easy to figure out and use. It replaced an older Sony model I have with a hard drive in it.. (yes, it is that old)..
customer_reviews.author: D.Ayotte

customer_reviews.title: Takes Great Pictures
customer_reviews.text: Takes great videos & still pictures but is a little on the heavy side. Using high resolution formats requires large memory cards.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great video quality. love the that i can adjust the iris on the fly.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great bundle for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to replace my 6 year old camcorder. Did a ton of reviews and the Sony fdr-ax53 meet all my needs. The one most important thing was a hot shoe adapter and a microphone jack. This bundle was a great deal when I bought it, it was just $20 more then the camera and came with memory card and bag. Thank you again for a great value bundle.
customer_reviews.author: W. Thai

customer_reviews.title: beautiful  pics even at night
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for Disney vac. Camera was very easy to use on auto settings. It is a little big in the lookhand when shooting nothing that cant be managed. Battery life was good for what i did with it. Stabilization systen on the camera is the best. You wont be disappointed i am not a pro by any means and everything worked perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Reed

customer_reviews.title: This bundle was a great deal when I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Have to agree with W. Thai. I was looking to replace my 8 year old camcorder. I also did a ton of reviews and the Sony FDR-AX53 meet all my needs. An important capability was a hot shoe adapter and a microphone jack in addition to the 20X zoom. This bundle was a great deal when I bought it, it was just $20 more then the camera and came with a 64GB memory card and bag. The bag will hold the camera and power cord but not much else. Thank you again for a great value bundle.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good for an entry level videographer
customer_reviews.text: As a video student, I have used it for several video projects, and people have commented on how great the quality is. It is also much cheaper than industry standard video cameras, and does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy M

customer_reviews.title: A Beauty
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to really use it yet, but it's a beauty.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick W. Casey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: Everything's perfect I know exactly what I was buying and it's great
customer_reviews.author: Ben K.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. I do a lot of wild life video
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. I do a lot of wild life video, the only thing that this camera does not do well is auto focus. Plan on using the manual focus more with this.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy hesford

customer_reviews.title: Nice but needs manual exposure mode.
customer_reviews.text: They should have included manual exposure mode, otherwise this camcorder would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for a great price
customer_reviews.text: We love this camera!! Love the dual recording option for social media or phone transfer. Reasonably easy to use and records great quality video and sound.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: No headphone jack
customer_reviews.text: All other features were acceptable, but no headphone jack for checking audio quality made this a deal-breaker. If I could have determined that lack before purchasing I could have avoided the return.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Hammons

customer_reviews.title: very happy
customer_reviews.text: easy to use for a noob like me. Amazing images quality, easy to use interfaces...
customer_reviews.author: arthu

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this camera
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this camera. Exceeded expectations. Only problem I had was trying to transfer files to my computer. I finally ejected the card and inserted into the computer to make the the transfer.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Lamothe

customer_reviews.title: I like it a great deal
customer_reviews.text: I like it a great deal. I would love it if were easy to focus in on objects that are close to the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Mozgai

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: after owning for a while now it has been great and everything we wanted from a video camera.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Great bundle!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera and great Bundle. The Memory is 94mb/s. Excellent speed!. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: J. S.

customer_reviews.title: Good camera you won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to do media training sessions for youth. Picture is great and it's durable. I am completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Clement

customer_reviews.title: A terrific little camera
customer_reviews.text: A terrific little camera. I have a Canon DSLR that does very nice HD with lots of lens choices, but I wanted to have 4K, also, and I wanted it in an easy to use camcorder format. I can take it to ballgames or family outings and not be distracted by too many choices. Just open up the LCD panel on the side and start shooting. The video stabilization works extremely well and doesn't seem to get in the way, at all. Just a very nice, easy to use 4K camcorder. Fits my needs exactly.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo M.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera but wish it had a few more manual controls.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for sports video
customer_reviews.text: I use this camera to record high school baseball and basketball. It does a phenomenal job, especially when recording in 120fps. Excellent image stabilization, very fast auto focus, smooth optical zoom.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchandphil

customer_reviews.title: The 4K and HD are great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camcorder. This is just like a regular tv camera.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Nicholls

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Excellent video quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Excellent video quality. Touch screen sensitive. Accidentally stopped video recording. Suggest using a remote.
customer_reviews.author: Pete M.

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear video
customer_reviews.text: Fast focus. Crystal clear video. Decent mic. Wonderful image stabilization. Haven't used very much. Bought a lexar 1800 v90 64gb and so far together they run flawlessly
customer_reviews.author: Evan Gelical

customer_reviews.title: 2 Thumbs Up
customer_reviews.text: Great Camcorder. Picked up for use for home videos of my first born. Works great steady shot.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rafter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: video quality is amazing plugging it to my 4k tv makes it way better!!!
customer_reviews.author: westley see

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera, no complaints
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect, everything I film looks great and there's so many options
customer_reviews.author: Jake Helios

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am blown away by the resolution I got from this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Davis Foulger

customer_reviews.title: The digital zoom is crazy good
customer_reviews.text: I wish the battery life was better, But it has a lot of great features. The stabilization isn't really useful if you are zoomed in on an object that is far away and moving but it's great if you are zoomed out. The digital zoom is crazy good. I was able to see the windows on a passenger jet. It was a very noisy image and hard to track without a tripod but I could make them out. I have not used the wifi settings.
customer_reviews.author: Lleland Abernathy

customer_reviews.title: Beware Focus is horrible
customer_reviews.text: Does not let you record in 4k while viewing on an external monitor.... THis only works in 1080p mode... very disappointing Sony has no intentions of putting out firmware update to fix the problem and you can be focused and move and the focus can take 20 seconds before it refocuses horrible for a sony
customer_reviews.author: Clohman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best 4k Video Camera for the money! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Love the camera
customer_reviews.text: Love the camera. For the money it cannot be beat. The Wifi control makes it easy to set it up and get out of the way while recording events. Low light is amazing, Nightshot, all the features.
customer_reviews.author: ToddAS

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product and I'm very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product and I'm very happy with it. My experience with this seller was excellent. I would not hesitate to deal with them again.
customer_reviews.author: Marcio Mafra

customer_reviews.title: very nice camera, be sure to get an extra battery
customer_reviews.text: very nice camera, be sure to get an extra battery, the one that cames with it, last 1 hr tops, and Sony brand SDs other are hit and miss compatible while filming 4k
customer_reviews.author: Dem Dag

customer_reviews.title: The SMOOTHEST camera EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is the best camera anywhere near this price point. The handheld imagery from this camera is the best I have used, almost like a steady camera used on movies, in that the lens uses little motors to keep the lens from shaking while handholding. I can almost shoot like it's on a tripod. The BOSS stabilization has no equals in the camcorder or DSLR market . There are ways to shoot it semi pro, but you can't do everything manually, understand it's limitations, and set yourself free.
customer_reviews.author: Bright Day

customer_reviews.title: (Didn't read instruction manual yet) Video looks really good in low light situation
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use. (Didn't read instruction manual yet) Video looks really good in low light situation. More expensive than other 4k camcorder, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Seiji T.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Cannot see the viewfinder outside. It's okay for indoor videos.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Stallard

customer_reviews.title: This is a very easy to deploy with great video quality camera
customer_reviews.text: I really like this camera! Great features. The only thing I don't like is the stability feature. My 17 year old digital 8 does it much much better than this unit. Not a deal breaker, however. Next time, I will shut off the stabilizer. This camera shines for vacation use. I took it to the Canyon and it was easy to deploy. Just remember, this isn't a professional camera. If you expect to have the flexibility of a pro cam you'll be dissatisfied. Enjoy! 😀
customer_reviews.author: Overlin

customer_reviews.title: This camera is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and quality as expeceted. This camera is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: L.Robert

customer_reviews.title: Not want I expected.
customer_reviews.text: So far, I am less impressed than with my previous Sony. Focus is incredibly slow. Very disappointing. I wanted to upgrade from an SR-100. I will get better video but knot at the level I anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Waynemia

customer_reviews.title: absolutely great resolution!
customer_reviews.text: Odd connectivity to other components, confusing manual, nothing simple, absolutely great resolution!
customer_reviews.author: Charles H. Denault

customer_reviews.title: Now getting use to my new Sony FDR-AX53 Camcorder. ...
customer_reviews.text: Now getting use to my new Sony FDR-AX53 Camcorder... did my first video two weeks ago... QUALITY is exceptional... looking forward to the future...:)
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Superb 4K HD Video Recorder
customer_reviews.text: Superb 4K HD Video Recorder !!! This was a gift to my wife on her birthday ! She only likes Sony equipment !!
customer_reviews.author: villaweb

customer_reviews.title: Good video but makes noise when recording
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this for a year and it's alright. Quality of the image is really good. Stabilization is pretty smooth and fairly clear even at it's Max zoom however the audio is not as good. The camera makes a noise while recording and in quiet environments it really puts the mood off. If you want to buy lavs it wouldn't be so bad. But like I said the product is alright. Only worth $700 maybe in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Dalton Thiem

customer_reviews.title: That said the picture quality is beautiful and battery life is good
customer_reviews.text: The size is equivalent to the old 8mm camera when they first came out--they will get smaller, but right now that is the state of the environment.. That said the picture quality is beautiful and battery life is good.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Hjelmar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Camcorder for YouTube.
customer_reviews.text: I use this camera for my up and coming YouTube channel and it never disappoints ! So easy to use and produces outstanding video quality. Below is my unboxing video and a zoo trip video with the Sony FDRAX/B 4K Video Recording Camcorder. Zoo video-[...] Unboxing -[...]
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Drotos

customer_reviews.title: Nightshot not working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for it's night shot mode. Come to find out it will not work with PlayMemories Mobile. You activate nightshot via the button (no other way), then you enable Wi-Fi and it automatically turns it off. Why? Pressing the button while in PMM does nothing. Can this be fixed, please?
customer_reviews.author: Horace Christopherson

customer_reviews.title: Shaky video
customer_reviews.text: The "steady shot" over compensate and creates shaking video for a second or so (when I touch the camcorder to change the zoom) when zoom in every far. I recorded a wedding using the camera (on an tripod with steady shot turned off). I find it impossible to adjust the zoom or turn the camera left or right or up or down without an awful shake in the video!! I had Sony camcorders for years and years. This is the worse one ever!
customer_reviews.author: tominiowa

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: its pretty good but I wish u could smoothen out pictures to much sharpness
customer_reviews.author: WavyJae

customer_reviews.title: it is total junk
customer_reviews.text: this was horrible. it kept throwing errors buffer overruns and things like that when recording then finally deleted all our christmas videos without warning. probably the worst sony item i ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: paulgs4

customer_reviews.title: Terrible piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: Does not record in 4K. Reboots every single time. Everything else works fine but what's the point in buying a 4k camcorder that can't record in 4k? First time buying a Sony camcorder but never again.
customer_reviews.author: asuslaptopuser

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, but big. Change settings to maximize quality of video.
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera! Only negative thing I would say is that if you aren’t using the hand strap and see just carrying the camera normally, I feel like I’m going to drop it because it is rather large. I use my entire hand to “palm the camera” and I still feel like it could slip out. And I am a big guy at 6’2”. So be very careful. Otherwise this is a great camera for families!! Make sure to change your settings to record on 4K!!! That’s the whole reason to buy this camera. The image stabilization is great too so make sure that is on as well!
customer_reviews.author: Gary V.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera. I was surprised with the night vision
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. I was surprised with the night vision. I was able to film good video of a band in dark night club
customer_reviews.author: mark kocher

product_meta.title: Sony FDRAX53/B 4K HD Video Recording Camcorder (Black)
product_meta.description: Configuration:Base4K XAVC-S recording with 16. 6MP, Exmor R sensor, B. O. SS stabilization ZEISS lens(26. 8mm) 20x optical zoom in 4K, 30x Clear Image Zoom in 4K3. 0" LCD (Touch panel), EVF, Wi-Fi/NFC, manual ring, night shot, 4K Time-lapse capture Built-in Zoom Microphone. Note-at a higher gain, the brightness becomes more appropriate in dim scenes, but the noise increases. At a lower gain, the noise decreases, but the shutter speed becomes slower to compensate for the lack of brightness, causing camera shake or subject blur
feature_bullets: 4K XAVC-S recording with 16.6MP, Exmor R sensor, B.O.SS stabilization
ZEISS lens(26.8mm) 20x optical zoom in 4K, 30x Clear Image Zoom in 4K
3.0" LCD (Touch panel), EVF, Wi-Fi/NFC, manual ring, night shot, 4K Time-lapse capture
